content: 8 total stitches are left been working on double points slip stitches until you 4 on the instep and 4 on the sole break yarn and using have only 2 needles a tapestry needle gather remaining stitches and with your needles parallel in your left hand your weave in the ends working yarn should be coming off the back needle on the right hand side break yarn leaving a tail about 6-8 inches long set up thread tapestry needle with tail of yarn enter the first stitch on the front needle as if to purl pull yarn through then enter the first stitch on the back needle as if to knit and pull the yarn through kitchener stitch enter the first stitch on the front needle as if to knit remove stitch from needle enter the second stitch on the front needle as if to purl and leave that stitch on the needle enter the first stitch on the back needle as if to purl remove stitch from needle enter the second stitch on the back needle as if to knit and leave that stitch on the needle continue in this fashion until you have only 1 stitch left on the front and back needle enter the last stitch on the front needle as if to knit and remove stitch from needle enter the last stitch on the back needle as if to purl and remove stitch from needle push needle through to the wrong side of the sock and weave your end in weave all remaining ends in option #3 lace pattern the lace pattern is a 10 stitch repeat it is 8 row long you will use it 4 times around on the leg and twice on the foot only on the instep the sole of your sock should be plain knitting stockinette 8 o /|\ o 7 6 o /|\ o 5 4 o /|\ o 3 2 o /|\ o 1 row 1 yo k3 skp k3 yo k1 row 2 knit row 3 k1 yo k2 skp k2 yo k2 row 4 knit row 5 k2 yo k1 skp k1 yo k3 row 6 knit row 7 k3 yo skp yo k4 row 8 knit o = yo = yarn over wrap your yarn around right needle one stitch increased /|\ = skp = slip knit pass slip 2 stitches together knitwise from left needle to right needle knit the next stitch pass the 2 slipped stitches over the knit stitch two stitches decreased blank squares = knit
